reviews.review_msg:
I hated and avoided math before Dr. J's class. Now I enjoy it... "This is a good news!"
 He is enthusiastic and encouraging to students. Best prof I've had at SFU

Amazing Teacher, it was a pleasure to be in his class. He was funny, enthusiastic and even though he was way to smart to be teaching the intro to math course I was taking, he was always excited about it. Brilliant man, his jokes were great and he is a class act. He was fantasic. 10/10.
